title: NIH selects Dr. Kathleen Neuzil as director of the Fogarty International Center and NIH associate director for international research
summary: Dr. Neuzil, the first woman to hold the permanent FIC directorship, will begin in early May.

title: Analysis of social media language using AI models predicts depression severity for white Americans, but not Black Americans
summary: NIH-supported study also found Black people with depression used different language compared to white people to express their thoughts on Facebook.

title: Experimental gene therapy for giant axonal neuropathy shows promise in NIH clinical trial

title: Inflammation-reducing drug shows no benefit for dry age-related macular degeneration in NIH trial

title: Repurposed drug shows promise against endometriosis-related pain in animal model

title: NIH studies find severe symptoms of “Havana Syndrome,” but no evidence of MRI-detectable brain injury or biological abnormalities

title: NIH researchers identify brain connections associated with ADHD in youth

title: NIH scientists find weak points on Epstein-Barr virus

title: Delta-8-THC use reported by 11% of 12th graders in 2023

title: NIH opens long COVID trials to evaluate treatments for autonomic nervous system dysfunction

title: Topical solution halts tooth decay in children
summary: NIH-funded study finds non-invasive application of silver diamine fluoride superior to placebo.

title: For childhood cancer survivors, inherited genetic factors influence risk of cancers later in life

title: Long-acting HIV treatment benefits adults with barriers to daily pill taking and adolescents with suppressed HIV

title: Children surpass a year of HIV remission after treatment pause

title: More than half of American Indian youth may have abnormal or high cholesterol
summary: NIH-funded study highlights importance of cholesterol screenings and education.

title: Vaginal ring and oral pre-exposure prophylaxis found safe for HIV prevention throughout pregnancy
summary: Multi-country findings provide evidence on HIV prevention for a priority population.

title: Semaglutide reduces severity of common liver disease in people with HIV
summary: NIH-funded findings inform interdisciplinary care approach across the lifespan.

title: Tools underestimate cardiovascular event risk in people with HIV
summary: NIH trial reveals need for more accurate screening in Black people and cisgender women.

title: New antibodies target “dark side” of influenza virus protein
summary: NIH researchers explore hidden, vulnerable region of influenza neuraminidase.

title: Smoking cannabis associated with increased risk of heart attack, stroke
summary: NIH-funded observational study shows risk grows sharply with more frequent use.

title: Bariatric surgery provides long-term blood glucose control, type 2 diabetes remission
summary: NIH-supported study shows long-term benefits of surgery compared to medication and lifestyle change.

title: Intervention reduces likelihood of developing postpartum anxiety and depression by more than 70%

title: Antibody reduces allergic reactions to multiple foods in NIH clinical trial
summary: Drug can help protect kids with multiple food allergies during accidental exposure.

title: Scientists develop a simple blood test to quickly diagnose sarcoidosis

title: NIH launches research network to evaluate emerging cancer screening technologies
summary: Clinical trials will assess multi-cancer detection tests, among others.

title: Long-acting HIV treatment demonstrates efficacy in people with challenges taking daily medicine as prescribed

title: NIH study offers new clues into the causes of post-infectious ME/CFS

title: 275 million new genetic variants identified in NIH precision medicine data

title: COVID-19 vaccination and boosting during pregnancy protects infants for six months

title: Researchers identify brain hub with key role in learned response to direct and indirect threats

title: NIH selects Dr. Sean Mooney as director of the Center for Information Technology
summary: Dr. Mooney is expected to join NIH in mid-March.

title: New direct links discovered between the brain and its surrounding environment
summary: NIH collaboration has implications for neural-immune system responses and aging.

title: Law enforcement seizures of psilocybin mushrooms rose dramatically between 2017-2022

title: NIH analysis reveals a significant rise in use of complementary health approaches, especially for pain management

title: Abnormal proteins found in the spinal fluid of people with ALS and frontotemporal dementia
summary: Proteins could serve as biomarkers that improve diagnosis and guide the development of novel therapies.

title: NIH study shows higher mortality rates for patients on respiratory support in rural intermediate care units
summary: Findings highlight the importance of providing ICU-level care to rural patients with respiratory failure

title: Switching to vegan or ketogenic diet rapidly impacts immune system

title: NIH-developed HIV antibodies protect animals in proof-of-concept study

title: Reduced blood lead levels linked to lower blood pressure in American Indians

title: NIH-supported researchers create single-cell atlas of the placenta during term labor

title: Reduced drug use is a meaningful treatment outcome for people with stimulant use disorders

title: A common marker of neurological diseases may play role in healthy brains

title: Semaglutide associated with lower risk of suicidal ideations compared to other treatments prescribed for obesity or type 2 diabetes

title: Biomedical STI prevention evidence is inadequate for cisgender women

title: NIH researchers create genetic atlas detailing early stages of zebrafish development
summary: Zebrafish are a powerful model for studying embryonic progression in vertebrates.

title: W. Kimryn Rathmell, M.D., Ph.D., begins work as 17th director of the National Cancer Institute
summary: Dr. Rathmell was selected by President Biden to succeed Monica M. Bertagnolli, M.D.

title: NIH research identifies opportunities to improve future HIV vaccine candidates

title: Reported drug use among adolescents continued to hold below pre-pandemic levels in 2023

title: Home Test to Treat program extends nationwide

title: Surgery beneficial for some children with mild sleep-disordered breathing

title: Study finds poor ventilation use during CPR for out-of-hospital cardiac arrest

title: Different transfusion approaches for helping heart attack patients who develop anemia recover led to similar 30-day outcomes

title: Monica Bertagnolli, M.D., takes the helm at NIH

title: Umbilical cord milking appears to be safe in preterm infants born after 28 weeks

title: Higher income and longer working years are linked to better mobility

title: Telehealth supports retention in treatment for opioid use disorder

title: Calorie restriction in humans builds strong muscle and stimulates healthy aging genes

title: Study reveals how young children’s immune systems tame SARS-CoV-2

title: Investigational drug restores parathyroid function in rare disease

title: NIH researchers work to preserve fertility for people undergoing gene therapy
